title: Leading primetime TV programming genres viewed in the U.S. 2015
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Sitcoms or comedy and lowest at Response Soap operas.
Response Sitcoms or comedy has 12.0 times more Share of respondents than Response Soap operas which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 48.0 is found at Response Sitcoms or comedy and the minimum is found at Soap operas where Response is 4.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Sitcoms or comedy and lowest at Response Soap operas.
Response Sitcoms or comedy has 12.0 times more Share of respondents than Response Soap operas which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Sitcoms or comedy and lowest at Response Soap operas.
The highest Response Sitcoms or comedy has 44.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Soap operas.
Response Sitcoms or comedy is higher than any other Responses with value 48.0, followed by Movies, and Drama. Down to Response Soap operas with the lowest value 4.0.
Response Children's, and Other type not listed have the same Share of respondents.
The Response Sitcoms or comedy tends to be 2.13 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 338.0.
